author: kkrouse
msg: fixing exception when validating a list of union where one item isn't valid.

author: ericvas
msg: Fixed selectPath to clear the current selections properly

author: kkrouse
msg: adding a uriprefix option to the .xsdconfig files.
if a schema's namespace starts with the uriprefix,
the package/prefix/suffix will be applied.  This
makes it easy to manage a large number of schemas
which all have different namespaces and place them

author: daveremy
msg: Added some miscellaneous inst2xsd feature tests

author: ericvas
msg: Fixed clearSelections -- needed to use -1 instead of 0
